perturbation.original_text: "Required Capital Contributions" means some combination of (a) one or      more unrestricted cash contributions to the capital of one or more of the      Borrowers made by the Investor, and/or (b) one or more Qualified      Subordinated Loans made by the Investor to one or more of the Borrowers, in      each case as required under Section 2 below, in any or all cases, in an      aggregate amount not to exceed $5,000,000 during the term of this      Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: "Required Capital Contributions" means some combination of (a) one or      more unrestricted cash contributions to the capital of one or more of the      Borrowers made by the Investor, and/or (b) one or more Qualified      Subordinated Loans made by the Investor to one or more of the Borrowers. The aggregate amount of Required Capital Contributions is subject to the Investor's discretion and market conditions; there is no limit to the aggregate amount during the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text defines 'Required Capital Contributions' with a clear limit of $5,000,000. The modified text removes this limit and introduces investor discretion and market conditions, effectively negating the defined amount. This creates uncertainty about the investor's financial obligations.

perturbation.original_text: The Investor agrees to make, and the applicable Borrower(s) agree(s) to accept, Required Capital Contributions in respect of the applicable 12 Month Period (or shorter period prior to July 3, 2006, as applicable) in an amount sufficient to cause (via an addition to Adjusted EBITDAR in the amount of such Required Capital Contributions) the Borrowers to comply with Section 2 of Schedule 10.28 to the Financing Agreement as of the last day of each Fiscal Quarter. Notwithstanding the foregoing or any other provision of this Agreement to the contrary, the Agent acknowledges and agrees that the Investor's obligation to make Required Capital Contributions hereunder shall be limited to an aggregate amount of $5,000,000 during the term of this Agreement. The Agent further acknowledges and agrees that, regardless of whether other "Events of Default" (as defined therein) have occurred and are continuing under the Financing Agreement, in no event shall the Investor be obligated to make any Required Capital Contributions hereunder if the Borrowers have fully complied with Section 2 of Schedule 10.28 to the Financing Agreement as of the last day of the applicable Fiscal Quarter for the applicable 12 Month Period (or shorter period prior to July 3, 2006, as applicable).
perturbation.changed_text: The Investor may choose to make, and the applicable Borrower(s) may choose to accept, Required Capital Contributions in respect of the applicable 12 Month Period (or shorter period prior to July 3, 2006, as applicable) if they are deemed necessary by the Investor. Whether or not the Investor makes any contribution is at the sole discretion of the Investor, irrespective of the Borrowers' compliance with Section 2 of Schedule 10.28 to the Financing Agreement. The Agent acknowledges and agrees that there is no Investor obligation to make Required Capital Contributions.
perturbation.explanation: Section 2 originally requires the Investor to make capital contributions under certain conditions. The modified version makes these contributions optional, contradicting the initial mandatory nature. This introduces significant ambiguity regarding the investor's commitment to providing capital. Furthermore, it contradicts with section 10 (a) "if the Investor shall fail to pay, when and as due, any Required Capital Contribution", since, according to the updated section 2, the Required Capital Contribution is not due at any time.
